name: uk-general-election-2015
title: Data on constituencies and candidates from the UK's general election in May 2015

fields.name: constituency_id
fields.description: unique code for a constituency, provided by the Office for National Statistics

fields.name: region
fields.description: in England, the sub-national geographical region in which the constituency lies; in Scotland, Wales, and Northern Ireland, the country name

fields.name: electorate
fields.description: number of people registered to vote in the constituency

fields.name: turnout
fields.description: number of valid votes counted in the constituency

fields.name: status
fields.description: whether or not the candidate who won the seat came from a party different to his or her predecessor

fields.name: swing
fields.description: extent of change in voter support since the 2010 election

fields.name: constituency_id
fields.description: unique code for the constituency, provided by the Office for National Statistics

fields.name: party
fields.description: name of the political party for which the candidate is standing

fields.name: votes
fields.description: number of votes the candidate received

fields.name: vote_share
fields.description: percentage of the constituency turnout that voted for the candidate
